scripts.e2e:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=%WEB_PORT% TEST_MODE=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_TEST_MODE=1 E2E_ALLOW_TEST_MODE=1 npm --workspace apps/web run start
scripts.e2e:run: cross-env PW_NO_SERVER=1 PW_WORKERS=1 PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:%WEB_PORT% playwright test -c tests/e2e/playwright.config.ts
scripts.e2e: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File tests/e2e/kill-web.ps1 && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File tests/e2e/kill-port.ps1 -Port 3030 && set WEB_PORT=3030&& start /B cmd /C "npm --workspace apps/web run dev:e2e" && npm run e2e:health && npm run e2e:run && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File tests/e2e/kill-web.ps1
scripts.ci:contract: npm run e2e:build && PORT=%WEB_PORT% TEST_MODE=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_TEST_MODE=1 npm --workspace apps/web run start & SERVER_PID=$!; node tests/e2e/wait-for-health.js; cross-env CONTRACT_BASE_URL=${CONTRACT_BASE_URL:-http://localhost:%WEB_PORT%} node scripts/contract-ping.js; kill $SERVER_PID || true
